channel.title: 317 PI Help with a simple command
channel.description: I want to make a command that makes others do a anim 2756 and say "Sir yes sir!". Like :pushups (user) Please help. Thank you everyone

item.title: 317 PI Help with a simple command
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:4, topic:465559”][quote author=imstrength link=topic=571010.msg4135011#msg4135011 date=1351610306]

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("dothis")) {
				String[] dothis = playerCommand.split(" ");
				try { 
					for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(dothis[1])) {
						Client p = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							p.startAnimation(2756);
							p.forcedChat("Sir yes sir!");
							return;
							}
						}
					}
					c.sendMessage("Player "+ dothis[1] +" must be online before using this command");
				} catch (Exception e) {
					c.sendMessage("Syntax - ::dothis [PLAYERNAME]");
						}
				}

i know you’re just trying to help but we encourage people to learn things…not be spoonfed commands…but yes…this looks like it works perfectly
[/quote]

People don’t even help on things as simple as this, and the help they give doesn’t help at all, so I thought I’d give it him.[/quote]
fair enough, if you didn’t post im sure it would have been a lost thread so i do appreciate it

Read full topic
item.source: 317 PI Help with a simple command

item.title: 317 PI Help with a simple command

item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“imstrength, post:3, topic:465559”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=571010.msg4135006#msg4135006 date=1351609605]

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("dothis")) {
				String[] dothis = playerCommand.split(" ");
				try { 
					for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(dothis[1])) {
						Client p = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							p.startAnimation(2756);
							p.forcedChat("Sir yes sir!");
							return;
							}
						}
					}
					c.sendMessage("Player "+ dothis[1] +" must be online before using this command");
				} catch (Exception e) {
					c.sendMessage("Syntax - ::dothis [PLAYERNAME]");
						}
				}

[/quote]

i know you’re just trying to help but we encourage people to learn things…not be spoonfed commands…but yes…this looks like it works perfectly[/quote]

People don’t even help on things as simple as this, and the help they give doesn’t help at all, so I thought I’d give it him.
